title: My google pixel 4a camera stops working from yesterday I don't know what happen. And ways to solve.
content: My google pixel 4a is stops working from yesterday and don't know what happens but it's shows a something went wrong pop up and says to close the app. It is really frustrating and anyone faced this issue and solved that can provide the proper way to solve this. And I cannot connect with the customer care as no option is available for me.
